channel.title: Houndeyes Turning Invisible
channel.description:
So, have found an obscure bug related to houndeyes. Steps to reproduce: 1. (Typically crouch-) Jump onto a houndeye. 1. (Stand up if crouching, seems to not happen if you are.) 1. Allow it to perform its sonic attack. 1. Houndeye mount turns invisible. Obligatory screenshot of nothing:
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/449582555680134999/0C14A9E63E7255E70FA995B4DDA77A5A97E51B71/[/img]

item.title: Houndeyes Turning Invisible
item.dc:creator: Sage_J_Fox
item.description:
So, have found an obscure bug related to houndeyes.
Steps to reproduce:

  1. (Typically crouch-) Jump onto a houndeye.
  2. (Stand up if crouching, seems to not happen if you are.)
  3. Allow it to perform its sonic attack.
  4. Houndeye mount turns invisible.
    Obligatory screenshot of nothing:

1600Ã—900

Read full topic
